name: Asherman's Syndrome with Secondary Amenorrhea
chief_complaint: I haven't had my period for 6 months after a D&C procedure
prognosis: Good with proper treatment, though may require multiple procedures. Fertility often restored but miscarriage risk remains elevated
description: A condition characterized by intrauterine adhesions and scarring, often following uterine trauma (typically post-D&C). The adhesions partially or completely obliterate the uterine cavity, leading to menstrual disturbances and infertility.
